iterations.text: Task 6.1: EpicsController#new (Manual Spec Form) - Create simple form with repository dropdown, base_branch input, tasks textarea, and submit button. Reference: @implementation-tasks.md
Task 6.2: EpicsController#create (Manual Spec) - Create action that calls Epics::CreateFromManualSpec interaction and redirects to show page. Reference: @implementation-tasks.md

Task 6.3: EpicsController#show (Basic, No Turbo) - Create static epic dashboard showing title, status, task list with badges, PR links, Start Epic button, and Refresh button. Reference: @implementation-tasks.md
Task 6.4: Start Epic Button - Create POST /epics/:id/start route and action that calls Epics::Start interaction. Reference: @implementation-tasks.md
